text: Dag Danielsen (born 8 April 1955 in Ullensaker) is a Norwegian politician. He was a Storting representative between 1997–2001, representing Fremskrittspartiet. In 2001, he was involved in arguments with the party leadership, and left the party with, among others, Vidar Kleppe. Danielsen has also been involved with local politics in Oslo. Danielsen is the general secretary of the Norwegian Chess Federation and his brother is lawyer Per Danielsen. ==References== Category:Members of the Storting Category:Progress Party (Norway) politicians Category:Politicians from Oslo Category:People from Ullensaker Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Norwegian politicians Category:20th-century Norwegian politicians
title: Dag Danielsen
